message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $150?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $165?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Let's try $155 as a potential price point for the product.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more. How about we meet at $160?
I'm glad we're narrowing down the price range, Alice. Would $157 work for you?
I'm really close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $158?
